name: SleepSoundsHeavyRain
0:
”Alexa, open heavy rain”
”Alexa, start heavy rain”
”Alexa, launch heavy rain”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: heavy rain
des: Sleep Sounds: Heavy Rain combines the sounds of rainfall with successful sleep induction. This sleep aid provides minutes of the most calming sounds in the world. The sound of rain mixed with soothing white noise is an amazing way to help calm your mind. This torrential rain will help you relax, unwind, and fall asleep faster. This skill is great for sleepless nights, restless sleepers, or anyone who wants an easy sleep aid for quick relief.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
